name: new
description: Creates a new workspace and an initial Angular app.
longDescription:
Creates and initializes a new Angular app that is the default project for a new workspace.

Provides interactive prompts for optional configuration, such as adding routing support.
All prompts can safely be allowed to default.

* The new workspace folder is given the specified project name, and contains configuration files at the top level. 

* The new app files are placed in the `src/` subfolder. A corresponding end-to-end test app is placed in the `e2e/` subfolder.

* The new app's configuration appears in the `projects` section of the `angular.json` workspace configuration file, under its project name.

options.name: collection
options.description: A collection of schematics to use in generating the initial app.

options.name: verbose
options.description: When true, adds more details to output logging.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

options.name: dryRun
options.description: When true, runs through and reports activity without writing out results.

options.name: force
options.description: When true, forces overwriting of existing files.

options.name: interactive
options.description: When false, disables interactive input prompts.

options.name: defaults
options.description: When true, disables interactive input prompts for options with a default.

options.name: inlineTemplate
options.description: When true, includes template inline in the component TS file. By default, an external template file is created and referenced in the component TS file.

options.name: directory
options.description: The directory name to create the workspace in.

options.name: experimentalIvy
options.description: EXPERIMENTAL: When true, creates a new app that uses the Ivy rendering engine.

options.name: skipInstall
options.description: When true, does not install dependency packages.

options.name: skipGit
options.description: When true, does not initialize a git repository.

options.name: commit
options.description: Initial git repository commit information.

options.name: newProjectRoot
options.description: The path where new projects will be created, relative to the new workspace root.

options.name: inlineStyle
options.description: When true, includes styles inline in the component TS file. By default, an external styles file is created and referenced in the component TS file.

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the new workspace and initial project.

options.name: viewEncapsulation
options.description: The view encapsulation strategy to use in the initial project.

options.name: routing
options.description: When true, generates a routing module for the initial project.

options.name: prefix
options.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors for the initial project.

options.name: style
options.description: The file extension to use for style files.

options.name: skipTests
options.description: When true, does not generate "spec.ts" test files for the new project.

options.name: createApplication
options.description: When true (the default), creates a new initial app project in the new workspace.

options.name: minimal
options.description: When true, creates a project without any testing frameworks and should be used for learning purposes only.
